description: This file serves as the main entry point for a React frontend application. It imports core libraries such as React and ReactDOM, along with styling and root application components. It initializes the React application's rendering process by attaching the App component to the DOM element with id 'root'.

methods.name: createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering a React component tree into the DOM.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders a React component into the DOM at the specified root.
